entries.name: Claws
entries: You can use your claws to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals {@damage 1d4 + @str} slashing damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Biting jaws
entries: Your fanged bite is a natural weapon, which counts as a simple melee weapon with with you are proficient. Your bite deals {@damage 1d4} damage piercing damage on a hit. When you hit a creature with this attack, your blood frenzy activates for an amount of turns equal to the damage dealt (as if you were submerged in liquid).

entries.name: Blood frenzy
entries: You have advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all it's hit points, so long as you are both submerged in liquid or standing in rain.

entries.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: You can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

entries.name: Natural armor (Though Scales)
entries: When you are not wearing any armor, your AC equals 12.

entries.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

entries.name: Age
entries: Sahuagin age the same as humans.

entries.name: Size
entries: Sahuagin are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sahuagin and one language known by the people your clan trades with, most often Elvish, Gnomish, or Dwarvish.

entries.name: Damage Resistance
entries: You have resistance to the lightning damage type
